White Fox::
The ice tomb she was in continued to drift south. The berg slowly 
started to melt as it floated along in the current.  The iceberg was 
now 2/3rds it's original size from when it broke off the glacier.  
She was now passing Alaska.  The beacon in her pod was still faint, 
but it could me made out more clearly since there was now less ice to 
block the signal.
